thread.title: Makeup Mogul Bobbi Brown on Reinvention

author: wsjcom
title: Makeup Mogul Bobbi Brown on Reinvention
text:
Despite having built a billion-dollar cosmetics brand, makeup mogul Bobbi Brown has no plans to slow down.
Ms. Brown, who left Bobbi Brown Cosmetics in December 2016, reveals the key to constant reinvention and the inspiration for her newest brand, Beauty Evolution, in this week’s Secrets of Wealthy Women episode.
“I don’t feel any pressure... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
